attributes.action: Against proposal 28 of Cumbria County Council budget cuts
attributes.additional_details:
Due to Cumbria County council budget cuts, Cumbria Fire and Rescue Service has proposed the following cuts.

Remove one of the two FRONT LINE appliances at fire stations in Penrith, Kendal, Workington, Whitehaven and Maryport.

Close Dalton fire station.

Relocate one of the two full time fire engines at Barrow to Ulverston

Change crewing arrangements on the county's two aerial ladder platforms.

CUTS COSTS LIVES

Stand up and be counted against these cuts and sign this e-petition
